name: Attraction (itch) (xHulaHoopx)
description:
This is a game I made for my first end-of-year submission on my game design course and I am quite proud of it. All the art and in game features are mine. 

Story: 

You play as a goddess and you have the power to attract others (men) while having to fight other females. If you bump into other females, you may have to battle against them, and the difficulty ranges.

(Very cliché, yes but it was a good start to my game-making journey)
